Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Reroute near 95th LaSalle
ShortDescription: 9 Ashland buses temp. rerouted SB via 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette & 95th: NB via 95th, State, 87th, Halsted & 95th due to police activity near 95th LaSalle.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to police activity near 95th LaSalle.

  • Southbound buses will operate via 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, then resume their normal route on 95th.
  • Northbound buses will operate via 95th, State, 87th, Halsted, then resume their normal route on 95th.

Allow extra travel time.
